value.title: StarCraft 2: BRAND NEW Map Pool - herO vs Dark! (Grand Finals)
value.excerpt: A new map pool is here for StarCraft 2! All of the previous 7 maps are replaced with new ones. Going forward we will use: Altitude, Ancient Cistern, Babylon, Dragon Scale, Gresvan, NeoHumanity and Royal Blood.
